MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG12 postcode area of Annan. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:18pm. Our engineers have arrived at the McNeish Drive substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:56pm on Monday, 22 March 2021
